Subject: Re: [junit] Re: Will JUnit 'fail()' trip up ALL code coverage tools?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=12653864; y=qziHymIRNXKuugM5xcbPC7HxfBdnwurAium7JkcubGj9jX1S

Jim McMaster wrote:
> Just curious...do you also write tests to test the code that tests the
> tests?  If so, when do you stop?
>  
> 

You missed the point. We're trying to make sure the tests are run, not 
test the tests. Code coverage is not the same as testing.


--
